name: NekoMantica
description:
Deliver children's  Haloween candy to the box on the right side. 

If the candy touches a spooky monster or the ground, it returns to the first player and you will have to start.

Controls:

To start - touch the first player on the left side.

Drag to the left bottom to target the next girl/ boy to the right. 

Fire!

Good luck and have fun!:)

Source code: https://github.com/MysticalNobody/flame_game_jam_2021

Made by a team:
